name: Music_3546.wav
keywords: ['spanish rock', 'fast guitar strums', 'organ', 'trumpets', 'simple percussion', 'male voice', 'fast tempo', 'happy mood', 'foreign language']
caption: This Spanish rock song features a male voice singing the main melody. This is accompanied by rock percussion playing a simple beat. The bass plays the root notes of the chords. A guitar strums chords with upstrokes. A trumpet, saxophone and trombone plays fills in between verses. An organ pays fills at every alternate count. The mood of this song is happy and upbeat. This song can be played in a comedy movie.
